title: CUPSHE Women Mini Summer Dress Cover Up Floral Shirt 3/4 Sleeve Cuff Tie Button Down Sundress Beach Dresses Cover Up Top
description: [Unique Design]: Introducing our Stars & Sparrows Blue Floral Shirt Dress. This beach cover up dress features a delightful blend of stars and sparrows and a classic button-up design. Loose waist and a true-to-size fit, with a tie at the cuff, which is also great as a maternity dress or swimsuit cover up.

[Perfect Sizing]: Available in XS=US(0-2), S=US(4-6), M=US(8-10), L=US(12-14), XL=US(16-18), XXL=US(20-22). Please refer to our size chart for specific measurements to achieve the perfect fit. Model Wearing Size S : Height: 5' 6'' in (168 cm), Bust: 34 in (86 cm), Waist: 25 in (63 cm), Hips: 30 in (76 cm).

[Multi Occasional & Gifting]: This blue floral dress is perfect for spring summer beach holiday vacation, casual daily wear, om, working day, nights out, dating, parties, clubs, coffee shops, weddings, honeymoons, homecoming, new year party, school day, evening dress, ceremony, welcome dress, and girls dinner etc. This casual dress is the ideal gift for yourself, girlfriend, wife, mother.

[Features]: Summer Dresses for Women / Shirt Sundress for Beach Vacation / Swimsuit Cover Ups Dress / V Neck Cover Up Holiday Dress / Loose Fit Dating Casual Dresses / Self Tie Sleeve Cuff Button Down / Blue Floral Mini Dresses
[Fabric And Care]: The Beach Holiday Dress is made of 100% Polyester, so that it is soft and comfortable. Regular Wash; Recommend with Cold Water; Do not Use Bleach; Do not Tumble Dry.
